alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 31 at 9:23AM EDT until September 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Huron River Near Hamburg affecting Livingston County. For the Huron River...including Milford, Hamburg, Ann Arbor...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Huron River near Hamburg. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM EDT Thursday was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon and continue falling to 6.1 feet Thursday, September 07. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Impact...At 7.5 feet, Flooding of houses and yards increase considerably. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM EDT.
